document_data.caption: A map showing al-Faddi River flowing toward Qudra.
document_data.name: Al-Faddi River
document_data.river source: The [[Furrowed Mountains]]</br>The [[Mountains of the Lizard's Tongue]]</br>The [[Spine of the Dog]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Faddi River''' was a split river system found in [[north Zakhara|north]] and [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The northern branch of al-Faddi River originated in the southern tip of the [[Furrowed Mountains]], flowing east then south before reaching [[Qudra]]'s bay on the coast of the [[Great Sea]]. The southern branch of the river originated where the [[Mountains of the Lizard's Tongue]] and [[Spine of the Dog]] merged. It flowed northeast before reaching Qudra.
document_data.Description: Once past the foothills of the mountains, the river turned the plains into fertile grassland.
